original_text: And the man came into the house: and he ungirded his camels, and gave straw and provender for the camels, and water to wash his feet, and the men's feet that were with him.
korean_text: 그 사람이 그 집으로 들어가매 라반이 낙타의 짐을 부리고 짚과 사료를 낙타에게 주고 그 사람의 발과 그의 동행자들의 발 씻을 물을 주고

sentences.original_text: And the man came into the house
and gave straw and provender for the camels
and water to wash his feet
and the men's feet that were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 사람들의 발도 씻었다
